results.name: Numerators of Taylor series for exp(x)*cos(x).
comment: Lehmer sequence U_n for R=2 Q=1. [_Artur Jasinski_, Oct 06 2008]
reference: G. W. Caunt, Infinitesimal Calculus, Oxford Univ. Press, 1914, p. 477.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, -1).
formula: a(n) = (b^(n+1) - c^(n+1))/(b - c) where b = sqrt(2)-((1 + I)/sqrt(2)), c = (1 + I)/sqrt(2). [_Artur Jasinski_, Oct 06 2008]
mathematica: b = -((1 + I)/Sqrt[2]) + Sqrt[2]; c = (1 + I)/Sqrt[2]; Table[ Round[(b^n - c^n)/(b - c)], {n, 2, 200}] (* _Artur Jasinski_, Oct 06 2008 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
